item.title: gradle-play
item.description: Basic Play Framework gradle configuration #+begin_src groovy apply plugin: 'java' apply plugin: 'play' apply plugin: 'idea' apply plugin: 'eclipse' repositories { mavenCentral() jcenter() maven { name "typesafe-maven-release" url "https://repo.typesafe.com/typesafe/maven-releases" } ivy { name "typesafe-ivy-release" url "https://repo.typesafe.com/typesafe/ivy-releases" layout "ivy" } } dependencies { testCompile group: 'junit', name: 'junit', version: '4.11' compile group: 'com.typesafe.play', name: 'play_2.11', version: '2.5.8' play group: 'com.typesafe.play', name: 'play_2.11', version: '2.5.8' // https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.slf4j/slf4j-simple play group: 'org.slf4j', name: 'slf4j-simple', version: '1.
